content.detailedDescription: Two or more black triangular objects spotted flying in formation, northbound. flew directly over me during the initial first years of numerous ufo close encounters and sightings. the two craft were black with no apparent lights but can be seen in front of star light, or the background light of the upper atmosphere. i don't remember reporting this but here it is for record. i believe these two were military stealth aircraft (although not very stealthy at the time of sighting). i don't have record of what the exact time and date of the event was but i think it was in the fall of 2008.
content.summary: Two black triangular objects spotted.

content.detailedDescription: Feeling selfless and sad, i stepped outside under a clear night sky. raised both my arms up toward the sky and willed for the 'light' to show up. i was now in tears and in a moment, the ufo silently floated over me. i than felt relieved and reassured, that everything will be ok. i was sad because, i came across a documentary clip on youtube about the sad story of how humane societies (dog pounds) put an end to animals lives when they don't think they'll be adopted. i wished that no living thing would have to endure such suffering, sadness, and pain. when the ufo came to my calling, i tried remote viewing my location and projecting that thought/information to the sky; intended for the ufo that had visited me numerous times in the past. however, before the ufo came by, one quick flash in the sky appeared. the flash looked like it was high up in the atmosphere. i didn't pursue or bother to get a camera, as i was selfless and only concerned for the well being of others. as it past over out of sight, i looked down and closed my eyes to ease my sadness. than went to sleep. today, i'm telling you this story.
content.summary: Feeling selfless and sad, i stepped outside under a clear night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the front right passenger seat of a car travelling at approximately 100 km/h. at the time we were heading south on the road where the ufo sighting occurred. it was nighttime at exactly 22:40 -06:00 cst when i spontaneously have a look out the window toward the clear sky. a second later a flash of bright white light appeared. this synchronized 'phenomena' has happened to me before and i do not consider it to be a coincidence any more. i said out loud, "wow, that's incredible." and the driver (my dad) said, "what is?". i shrugged my shoulders and said it was just a shooting star. i didn't say it was a ufo that happens to "appear" and "approach" me from time to time. it's a subject that i'd prefer not to talk about to family members and friends all the time, despite the frequent 'visits' of ufos.

every time i'm visited by these ufos, i get a sense of relief and joy. although, some time after such events, i'm reminded not to be so naive, as to think i am summoning or have a guardian for that matter. i must remember my intuition and remain in the balance by keeping myself aware of technological, scientific, psychological, military and intelligence community capabilities.

note: - the light appeared stationary and above the city. however, it is possible it was just outside city limits, as that was where we were heading.

- the sighting reminded me of my visit to a job fair. i remarked to a city air port radar operator, "how about those ufos?". he laughingly replied, "too much paperwork." and his supervisor looked caught off guard.

sincerely
content.summary: Flash of light spontaneously appears shortly after looking out the window.

content.detailedDescription:
It light up the entire room...I awoke and went to the window and saw a stationary ball of light to my left..And it stayed there for a few seconds and then it went up and over toward the river with a stream of light behind it and disappeared.   about a month later it happened again the same way...Others did see this around the city because we heard a news cast on the radio about reports of the light that morning...Both happened sometime before daybreak in the early morning hours around 2:00 or 3:00 am.

the second time it happened i was looking out the window and don't really remember going to the window but i guess i must have just jumped up out of bed and ran to it right away.  the second time it was head on and shining right at me.  we lived at that time on a big hill above the river...I have lived on the river all my life and know for a certainty it was not a barge search light and it wasn't a helicoper...No sound.  that is all i can remember about it other than to me it was peaceful and i wasn't afraid.
content.summary: Glaring light came into my window..No sound...It was a ball of light  in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i seen a bright light in the eastern sky, and moved from to the south eastern sky. then back to where it was. a group of my friends seen it too.. 

and on the way home, walking on gun club road, i kept a close eye on it, and by the time i got home it was brighter then ever. of course when your in total darkness anything in the sky get brighter.

but when it moved it was a slow moving, and then back to its original course
but faster.

it was brighter then any star in the sky, it was a very bright, and had a orange type tale.

air tragic control at pdx said nothing was reported, however, it does not explain the fact that both myself, and forty six friends of mine seen the same thing. we were all having a quit little party, no drinking, and no drugs.  

i was thinking that something out of the ordinary, i new it was not a star at all, and it wasn't there the day before. at least i didn't notice it.

i'm not a skeptic, i do believe there is intelligent life out their, and i have seen something when i was child in massachusetts. 

as far as loosing sight of it, i never lost sight of it til i decided to go to bed, and then checked it out on the internet. i found find out that is was reported??
content.summary: Bright light in eastern sky over oregon.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a friends front porch having a discussion when i noticed an extremely bright stationary light out of the corner of my eye, and dismissed it thinking it was a tower. my friend said something about it and we studied it further and noticed it was not a tower. the object was over a mile away and got increasingly bright as if to be moving toward us. the object started moving in presice geometric movements to the right and then downwards. the object turned upwards very quickly. it then moved to the right again and the light seemed to be dimming. it ultimately dissapeared. me and my two friends then started discussing all possibilities of what it could have been. we came to the conclusion that no man made craft could have fit the description of what we saw. the best way to describe what we saw was an unidentified flying object not of this world.
content.summary: Intensly bright amber colored object.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out for a break at work to the back deck (second floor) of our office.  i'm a birder, amateur astronomer, i'm also into entomology, aviation and meteorology...So i'm pretty well versed with objects in the sky (day or night) and am always looking up to see what i can see.

standing on the deck looking up at some seagulls and a jet going by i saw a bright white dot at a very high altitude about 60 degrees up from the western horizon about 15 degrees north of me.  it looked very reflective (bright) with no contrail, no sound, no tail etc...Just a bright white round dot.  it was travelling w/sw very fast and dissapeared suddenly about 30 degrees north of the eastern horizon just a bit south of me. it took 7 seconds to cross 50% of the sky.  it was not burning/burning up, like a meteor, it was a very clear, white dot of light.  it didn't twinkle or oscillate, or deviate from it's course.   it went across the sky too fast to be a high jet or satellite...And way too slow to be a meteor.  also to high to be a bird.

since i'm used to looking at satellites, birds, planes, insects, clouds and stellar objects, i'm pretty good at judging distance, altitude, speed etc.  this object was hard to judge though because it was small and very high...If i had to take a guess i'd say it was 50,000 ft up (at least 10,000 ft above the cirrus clouds).   the sky was mostly clear with a few cummulus clouds and a few very high, thin, cirrus clouds.   when it disappeared in the eastern sky, i could not tell if it just blinked out (disappeared) or if it possibly just became obscured by the cirrus clouds (which were pretty thin/wispy in that spot in the sky).

[name removed/cms/tg]
toronto
content.summary: Very bright round dot (or spot). very high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 2100 hrs thursday, 15 july 2010, looking up at the sky, looking at the stars and counting the airplanes as i always do.  it was clear and cool (76f). i suddenly noticed a bright star like object moving accross the sky in a easternly direction in a zig zag then continued a straight line.  i hollered for both my boys 9 and 10 yrs of age to wittness the sight.  i looked at the time on my cell phone to have an idea of what time i saw it.  it was 2138hrs when the boys came out and viewed it with me.  we watched together for about 1 minute as it then  just dissapeared out of our sight due to the tall pines in our yard.  i knew it couldn't be a plane with take off / landing gear lights cause planes don't fly backwards and zig zag high in the sky. it didn't appear to be a star / commet, cause they always move extremly fast in a straight line.
content.summary: Bright star like zig zag once then flew a straight line as high as the other stars in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok. i've never done anything like this before,so bear with me. i think it might have been around june of 1972( truthfully im not sure about the exact date,but i think it's close. i had an early interest in astrology,so one late, and very clear night i was laying on my grandmothers barn watching for meteors.From my point of view i could see practically from horizon to horizon, except for a few trees that were tall enough to distract my veiw. as i was lookng i saw a bright spherical light that kind of looked like a star but much brighter than the planet venus and moving quite oddly. it suddenly appeared just above the horizon(i think western)and moved from horizon t horizon passing directly overhead,except it wouuld move roughly 10 degrees almost in an instant then make a huge "u" shape just as quick then again com to an instant stop. im guessing the top of th u about 20 degrees and from top to the bottom of the "u" about thirty degrees. it repeated this same pattern until it disappeared at the opposite horizon. over the years i've had an interest in astronomy, so i understand some physics and understand inertia. i know this could havent been man made because anything moving like that wouuld destroy itself. i have only told a few friends and family about this over the years. the main reason im reporting this now is that i would like to know has or did anyone seen this? then about 2 years later i experienced missing time while driving,however i dont know if these events are connected. i know to a lot of people would be skeptical,so please respond, i just need some closure after all these years. sincerely, 
*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: I was laying on the top of my grandmother's barn watching for meteors on a perfectly dark and clear night.

content.detailedDescription: two of us witness them  one took pictures   didnot tell anyone of my involvement until years later showed my kids where and what i saw    many years later my one son came home from school with a paperback book on ufos  it showed a dated picture that the other party had taken which was listed as of the photos by a professional that project blue book couldnot dipute and it showed exactly what i had told my kids  unfotunetly he took the book back to school before i could copy info  i would like to find that photo again for my kids  please help tu *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) [yes,iam not a typest] i was on offical business[military] at the time and the other person pointed them out to me but later advised me to keep my mouth shut,it cost him! i aqlso was a professional and knew what i was seeing both objects  just stayed hovering above the  the power plant less than 1/8 mile away and aprox 100 ft above plant and its stacks  they both appeared the  same asaucer like objects with a partial dome on them which seemed to have a yellowish/white light or port on the dome  the out4er edges of the saucer had/showed a changing light pattern that veried from blue to orange to red but in a drifting pattern life the old movie  marquis used to do  he apparentlt had time to get a camera ,take pictures and change film  the gov took on of the but he latter tould that i soom day see the other as i explained i finally did iwent inside to get my camera too but when i came out they were gone  my time observing the was apprx 3-5 mins his must have been much loner  his name and rank and the date was noted in the photo
content.summary: Two ufos over nearby power plant.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a fellow marine were standing post around 2 am when we were looking up and had seen 4 orange lights in a trapezoid shape or formation fly over...We work around military aircraft its nothing we have seen and pretty much all aircraft in that area you will hear but this was silent and the shape stayed the same no staggering like normal military aircraft. the lights were low enough for it to make noise but it was dead silent. the object flew over fast and disappeared over the mountains.
content.summary: Fast, trapazoid, silent.

content.detailedDescription: It happened very quickly.I was fascinated and astonished.I was sitting on balcony in backyard having a cigarette.I watched the ufo fly by and disappear behind,yet above tree in backyard.I then went inside.About two-three minutes later,my son(then 15) and his friend came running into the apt. from outside .They were quite scared and said they had just seen a strange light near the front yard gate,which seemed to be following them.I then shared with them what i just saw and i stated that i was going back outside.They were frightened and refused to come with me,though i was only going back to balgony.I was not scared but fascinated and intrigued.It was dark outside and the light from the object was quite bright and even seemed to glow from white to bluish to extra glowing around it.It travelled very fast.It may have lasted 10 seconds but could've been more like 5-6 seconds.Now that i write this i am still fascinated and realize for the first time that my son's sighting of the light thing ,must of been what i saw;except i now only realize it must have changed course to go to front yard area.Wow.I believed what i was seeing was something rather extraordinary,a ufo of some sort.I have never seen anything like it before or since.It was cylinder in shape ,approximently 1-2 meters in length(though that too may have changed during the course of it's flight across my vision),and was about the size of a mountain bike tire-say,26 cm.Or perhaps a bit smaller,must of been about 30 ft away from me but in the air above where i was sitting and about 30-40 ft in air.It disappeared behind the tree.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A shape, white in colour suddenly moved (flew) in the air, seemed to glow bluish.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on hwy 177 going north when we spotted the aircraft,red blue lights to side, flashing blue-ish light in the middle of a half circle shaped object. very obviously not an airplane, outlines were very clear.Metalcoloured aircraft,was just hanging or hoovering in the sky, about the height of an airplane just taking off. when me and my son saw this and realized it was not an airplane, i took the next exit so i could go around and back on the hwy to get another look and or attempt to take a picture. it took us about 2 minutes to get back to the very same area but there was  nothing there.
content.summary: Ufo with red  and blue lights hovering above the trees on side of hwy.

content.detailedDescription:
The 1st two close ups are from july 15/10 , w.  i just focused on these interesting 'objects' & aren't sending in any with just the white orb lights that most people see anyways .
the 3rd photo is from june 20/10 , es , showing a 'structure' like in the daytime clouds .
content.summary: Zoomed in photos of distant ships.

content.detailedDescription: Was reviewing construction sites on mona st in oxbow sk and used google maps to look up the actual views from the street. i noticed a teardrop shaped black ufo that appears near the sun in most of the views when moving up mona street. the ufo seems to change shape and also at some poiint has some "tentacles" emanating from one end. in one photo it appears to have 2 spotlights at the front too. it's not a helicopter as there is no discernable rotor or tail rotor. the ufo is visible on all the positions of the "viewing man" in google maps when moving it along mona street until the end of the street. the ufo seems to move then further away from the sun. i have no indication of when the google photos were taken but given the position of the sun and the absence of snow - i would anticipate in the spring between 11am and 1pm. take a look... again search for mona st, oxbow, sk and position the "viewing man" at any position on mona st and look up near the sun - you can't miss it - it seems to be about 300 ft in the air.
content.summary: Check google maps for mona st, oxbow, sk - look near the sun - teardrop shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out my frount door to get a milk crake to set my tv out side.When something cauht my eye,ilooked up tward tampa bay and said what the hell is that,i saw a big bright light riseing up in a snake like pattern real high in the sky and then stop.About a minite later it moved south in jet speed the stoped on a dime.Then it moved again in jet speed and stoped,then the light just closed in on it self.All that happen between 9:18 to 9:24.Because i looked at my cell phone.It was not a plane or helichoper the start and stop motion was just too fast for the both.
content.summary: A strange moving light.

content.detailedDescription: Driving n/e to local iga to pick up ice cream. noticed two glowing red/orange objects in the sky over the mackinaw bridge. cloud cover was approx. 20,000 with sporadic patches. no discernible wind speed. the objects were approx. 8-10,000 feet up. i pulled off the side of the road in front of the recreation center and  exited the van to observe. cell phone camera yielded no detail. for approx. 5 minutes i watched the objects at even length intervals from one another. they began to rotate counter clockwise at a n/w angle. shifted appro. 60 degrees. the forward object began to dwindle in size disappearing behind what i thought might be a small cloud. i momentarily lost track of them. entered my van again and drove to the fort parking lot at the beach and at the base of the mackinaw bridge to observe over the water without obstruction. i picked up one of the objects again, larger and brighter than before at a lower altitude, perhaps 5-6,000 feet. it was hovering over head for approx. 2 minutes and began to move s/w with a finger guided pace of approx. 12 inches in 12 seconds or 30 degrees. it began to ascend at an angle and rapidly accelerated upward and out of sight. there was no sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 red/orange globes moving in tandem over the mackinaw bridge either separating in oposing directions or uniting into one.

content.detailedDescription:
Main army installation in central texas. restrited airspace.
date: 10 june 2010 eary daylight sighting
approx time: 7:45 - 8:00am

personal background: vertran, navy sonar supervisor.Perform services as simulation tech aviation since seperation. army instalation central texas.
as a side note, i am surroundined by aviation and easily reconizeable aircraft both day and night.

on the morning of 10 june i walked out of the building i work in to get get some air and reflect on the early morning chaotic activity. the only area that has doors and windows is the front area of this building. it has a approx. sw footprint when exiting the main entrance. 

after i walked through and beyond the entrance from the building, i panned the surrounding area both ground and sky. as i turned and looked to ne ( more easterly ) i noticed a very bright star looking light. i found that odd because it seemed intensely bright. at first i thought an unuaslly clear bright morning star?? the building i work in has lighting rods around its outer perimiter. as i watched this bright light ( myself remaining stationary ) it had movement across the sky against the rod.

the sky was mostly clear. some whispy broken cloud masses were visable. it had an apperance as a fixed wing aircraft on a approch pattern at night.
very bight as it approched.

as i watch this aircraft/objet travel from approx. ne to sw direction it beacame clear to me that this wasn't the usual aircraft seen around here.
i asked one of the personell in the building to come out and look.
i point out the object to this person but because he is near sighted and was not wearing his classes he couldn't make out the details i was talking about. at this point is was about at an apex to our location.

this person cannot or will not collarate this event.

this object remained on a straight and steady path for the duration.

estimated size: c130 aircraft ( fusalage only )
estimated altitude given visual conditions: 1500 - 4000 ft. agl
estimated speed: 300 - 500 kts
apperance: cylider, silver. no wings, no tail rudder, no propusion sound,
no rotor and no propeller visable. mid legnth it had what appeared to be windows or some type of black banding.

conlusion by this witness: based on that fact that this can be a high traffic area,i speculate that nobody else in the immedidiate area would expect to see or question what i witnessed/saw. unless i ran running around like a chicken with my head cut off.

after all my years of hearing about these kinda things i am really stumped.
content.summary: Cylinder object, silver, no wings, no sound over restricted air space.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my back yard having a cigarette  when my youngest son pointed out 2 lights in the clouds.At first i thought it was search lights coming from the market area or even from the blues festival till the thicker clouds partially covered the lights. so i was running all the possible causes in my head still thinking this should have a logical explanation till one of the lights took off heading east at high speeds crossing the horizon within seconds.The second light made a check mark  movement as it also left at high speeds leaving me in a state of what i can only describe as euphoria. i didn't get any photos for the only camera i own is on my phone and phone cameras take crappy pictures at any distance.My wife also saw these.There was no sound.Also when they left, the one heading east went through a clear patch of sky but was still fuzzy like a lit up cloud.I think that's all of it but if i remember anything else i will post it.I am really excited with this citing i have seen strange things before like satellites chasing each other but this was my closest citing which from what i can tell was just above the lower cloud ceiling.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 lights hanging for half an hour.

content.detailedDescription:
When i retired for the evening i found it hard to sleep.  then i heard a sudden loud high pitched sound in my bedroom, and outside.  the sound reminded me of the planet venus somehow.  i got up on my elbow trying to make ends-meet of where the sound was coming from (the source of the sound), but i could not.  finally the sound got slowly dimmer, as though an object outside was slowly moving away.  the sound got dimmer in my bedroom, until silence.

the next morning i looked at my casio solar calculator and to my complete surprise i saw on it: -ppp1000000 to the power of 14.  the 2 last ps were separately underlined.  i have no idea what it means, as i bought that calculator 6 months ago, and it never did anything like that.  it is a new $14 calculator i bought at office depot.

the number of digits on the code exceeded the calculators maximum by 2 digits.  

i could never figure out how to work any of the buttons, besides the number buttons and the basic math tool buttons.  it has pi and all kinds of buttons that i never use or don't work.

i immediately contacted mufon headquarters, and reported the incident.  they were supposed to get back with me in 48 hours, but never did.

thank you.
content.summary: High pitched sound then finding a code or formula the next morning on my calculator

content.detailedDescription: My friend was meeting her husband for work at winchester industrial park, she thought she saw a plane coming toward her so she started taking pictures with her cell phone, then she thought the plane was crashing, because it was moving side to side like it was unstable,then it got real bright and stoped right over her and then disapeared i have 3 pictures that she took with her cell phone.. i would like to know if someone could tell me if they are real and what this object is ...It is realy weird looking!
content.summary: My friend thought she was watching an airplane...She took 3 pictures on her cell phone and we  would like some one to see this.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on back deck with wife and noticed very bright object coming from the south. we thought it might be the iss,until it changed course from heading north to north east and then due east. object was moving slower than iss and much slower than an aircraft. we call our 9 yr old to observe. after it went from view we noticed three air craft to the south(we never have that much traffic here)i went in and checked the iss viewing time and it was 9:32 central time. i didnt get film of it as we so manyas of late.This object was different due to the curved path it took.
content.summary: Wife said it looked diamond shaped.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were in the back yard at dusk. it was still very light outside, but some neighbors behind us had started shooting fireworks. we saw a strange red glowing light on the tree covered hill in the distance. at first i thought it was some sort of firework. then i thought maybe it was tail lights from a car going up the hill slowly. it kept rising past the trees, and then flew in our direction. i then thought maybe it was a helicopter, but realized that it couldn't have taken off in the middle of the trees like that. it was a steady glowing red light. it made no sound at all. as it got closer and was flying over the neighbors yard i could see the outline of a black or dark gray saucer shape. the glowing red light was on the bottom of it. my son ran to get my husband, and we followed it to the front yard and watched it fly off in the distance. we were able to watch it fly for about one to two miles before we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Rose straight up off the top of the hill slowly and flew over the neighboring yard.

content.detailedDescription:
I originally submitted this report to the national ufo reporting center on 10/26/2009, and it was posted on their online sightings database on 12/12/2009. i thought i would submit my story here, as well:

i had trouble falling asleep on saturday, october 24, 2009, and so around 11:30 pm, i just started looking up at the stars outside my bedroom window like i do occasionally whenever i can���������t sleep. this night was different however, because i immediately noticed bright lights in the sky in an arrangement similar to the big dipper. my window faces east, so i was looking that direction. this link video footage of exactly what i saw, with a few minor differences:

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

like the formation in the video, the formation i saw had only two objects forming the handle, except the formation i saw had the handle tilted diagonally upward. also, the formation i saw was staying pretty much stationary, with the exception of one of the objects (the lower object in the dipper handle which was sort of swaying back and forth, not in a dramatic way but ever so slightly, and it was this that initialy caught my eye to look in that direction) and the only other difference is that the formation in the video seems to be more tightly packed in, and the formation i saw was a bit more spread out. all the objects i saw were dimming in and out, and the object that was swaying would occasionally flash a dark red.

a lot of things i witnessed are similar to the video like the altitude, the brightness and coloration, size, and of course, the formation itself. (obviously, it was a lot darker outside during my sighting than the sighting in the video, but everything else is similar). off to the right of the dipper formation, were four objects in no particular order or formation that slowly moved together to form a crescent shape or half circle. during this time, the dipper formation stayed in place, with all objects now dimming in and out. eventually, the object at the bottom of the crescent began to flash wildly, first in it���������s ���������natural��������� color, then in dark red and blue. it struck me as sort of like a morse code, or signal of some kind, and i assume it was ���������communicating��������� to the dipper formation, at which point i got spooked and went downstairs to make coffee as this was all a bit too much for me to handle. i���������ve always been a skeptic about ufos and this has pretty much shaken up my whole world view. i can no longer deny that ufos exist. in the video link i provided, it appears that formation is regrouping into separate formations, and i can only assume that is the activity that i was witnessing, but i didn���������t stay to witness the whole incident because i was pretty shaken, so i can���������t say what eventually happened. when i worked up the courage to come back up to my bedroom and have a look out the window about a half hour later, both the dipper formation and half circle formation had gone, nowhere to be found.

at first, i thought i was looking at stars, but then i noticed they were arranged like the big dipper, and i knew that the big dipper would not be that low in the sky or as bright as they appeared. i have not seen this dipper formation in the eastern sky before or since this particular evening.
content.summary: 10 ufos over santa rosa, california (six in a big dipper formation, four in a half circle).

content.detailedDescription: I was a teen-ager and i was finishing up cutting the lawn (i still lived with my parents).  it was dark but i was on my dad's lawn tractor (it had driving lights).  something caught my attention up in the sky.  it was dark out but starry.  i could see what looked like lights in a triangle shape that were not the same color as the stars.  they were orangish.  i thought it was a helicopter, as whatever it was, it was stationary.  i made a few more rounds in the yard and kept looking at the object.  the more i thought about it the more i realized that it was not a helicopter as there were no flashing lights, let alone no red or blue lights.  i started to get freeked out and shut off the lawn mower to try and hear the object; it made absolutely no noise.  i knew that my parents were sitting on their back porch talking with our next door neighbors.  i ran around to the back of the house and got all 4 of them to come out into the back yard so they could see what i saw.  we were all looking at the object and speculating as to what it could be then it just took off.  i don't mean that it slowly moved away, it rocketed across the sky in a few seconds and never made any noise at all.  it's flight path was due north.  nothing was ever said in the news about its appearance.  we all fiured it was not from this earth.
content.summary: It was hovering for several minutes then took off like it got shot out of a gun.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch having coffee watching the birds fly around, when i noticed a one was not flapping it's wings.  the birds landed but the object in sky did not.  it was v-shaped, but slightly more rounded like a boomerang. the color was dark dull charcoal black/grey, not shinny at all, no lights,no sound of an engine, and no contrail.  it was traveling north west, but it was very high in the sky, not at the height most airplanes fly in this area. this is not the flight pattern that i see other planes flying at either.  the object seemed to be traveling along a straight line of flght.  i watched it until it went out of my sight.  this was on a very clear, sunny day, very few clouds in the sky.  watched it for about 2 minutes.
content.summary: Object appeared to be traveling nw in the sky along a straight path.

content.detailedDescription: After hearing of recent ufo activity in my area [youtube link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg] i was curious if the ufos were still active.  after 20 minutes of watching the skies from my bedroom window i saw a red orb appear, it was approximately 2 miles away. it was visible for 30 seconds before vanishing. other ufo watchers several miles away reported seeing no activity on this night but i believe that the low altitude of the orb combined with the hilly terrain of western pennsylvania placed the orb out of their field of view.
content.summary: A red orb appeared suddenly and was visible for 30 seconds before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my balcony relaxing on my lawn chair and was laying back looking up as the sun was starting to set.  i noticed a light that looked like static at first, and then a bright pure type of light that was constantly lit.

it turned into two lights and appears to hover.  it appeared to get brighter which made me think it was coming straight downward at me until if finally moved to my left which is south.  the dec was between 70 to 85.

these two lights moved together slowly, then stopped for about 3 minutes and hovered when a commercial airplane going from west to east on the north side of my house.(assuming it was headed to dtw airport)  when it passed, these two lights moved again going slowly back to the north right over my head.  it stopped again and the two lights merged together as one and it looked like the light winked out.

there was no noise at all.  i was upset with myself that i did not run to get my camera because i was afraid by time i got back it would have been gone.  i have to say i got the worse static shock when i opened my slider door to get back in my bedroom.  it shocked me so bad it freaked me out, it's probably unrelated, but it made me curious if it had anything to do with this siting.

this lasted for about 5 minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw 2 lights side by side then shifted into each other to make one light.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down my street and saw it, as soon as i got out of my car i ran across the street to watch it.  i called my parents who were inside on my cell phone to come out and see it.  they didn't make it out in time to see it, it went behind a tree and i lost sight.  i later saw that the iss was making fly overs that week so i figured it was that, however i watched 4-5 of the flyovers after that to "see it again" but even the brightest -4.0 magnitude was easily 100x smaller and not as bright as the ufo i saw, the iss was also not red during any of its fly overs.  i then googled "ufo july 4, 2010" and found one video that was the exact object i saw.  unlike many of the ufos that day mine was a single globe instead of the triangular formation of 3.  there could have been more around but i was very focused on that one that i did not check the rest of the sky around me.  it was not flashing or strobing.  we have many planes that fly over our house so i know it was not a plane of any kind.
content.summary: Red glowing globe of light, slowing rotating headed ne.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning that night from a day long hike in the los angeles forest and decided to stop at one of the pull over sites off highway 2 to get a view of the city's lights. i parked and walked away from my vehicle towards the canyon that runs parallel to the road. i stood there for about 5 min when all off a sudden i noticed a green falling star streak the sky in front of me and fall in to the canyon perhaps a couple hundred yards from where i was standing. i paid no attention to it since i had already seen these (green falling stars)up in northern ca. aprox 5 min later, i heard the bushes below being tangled with and as i turned to see, i noticed this "being" walking up the trail towards me. it walked right up to me and stood there. i could only make out the silhoutte as being very humanlike but with short legs, i could not see any facial features, perhaps the head being a little oval/longer than the average human head/shape. since 4 years have passed, i have faint memories but at the moment i suspected it being covered in fur/hair from head to toe. it stood there and i was in disbelief, i knew what i was seeing but my brain was swirling in all directions. maybe a minute or two passed and i stomped the ground to see it's reaction, immediatly the "thing" jumped as if scared and turned and walked to its left (my right)and stood there facing me once again.As it had turned, i noticed a white patch of something on its lower back. i immediatly turned around and went to my car and left. no noise of any kind was emitted at all through out the encounter.
visibility: lights of city provided excelent visibility as if it where full moon.
exact location: hwy 2 angeles crest highway, turnout located about 1 1/2 miles north of last house heading in to park. about 1/2 mile before the ranger station. 
description of creature:human silhoutte, about 3-4 feet in height, covered in short hair,walked on two short legs just like a human being, no facial features where visible.
conclusion: 25 yrs hiking in the park, never seen anything like it or even walk like it, definetively non native animal, called forest service and got laughed at.
content.summary: Falling star with green hue.
